content:
Dear all,

We are organising a meeting on the topic “Formalizing Higher Categories”, June 8–12 next year, at the Mittag-Leffler Institute in Stockholm: https://www.mittag-leffler.se/activities/formalizing-higher-categories/

Capacity for the meeting is highly limited, so attendance is by invitation only. To keep the selection as open and inclusive as possible, we would like to hear from anyone potentially interested in attending or following online.

If you are potentially interested in participating, please fill in the form https://forms.gle/GfRFQj2jhQHiWkqVA by Tuesday, October 7 so we can take it into account for planning.

Best,
–Nima, Thierry, Paige, Jonathan, Peter.

@Nima Rasekh
@Thierry Coquand
@Paige North
@Jonathan Weinberger
Peter LeFanu Lumsdaine
